title: Important Update: ICAI Reschedules CA Intermediate Paper 5 (Auditing and Ethics) Exam
content:
# Important Update: ICAI Reschedules CA Intermediate Paper 5 (Auditing and Ethics) Exam

Ek important update hai for all CA Intermediate students! The Institute of Chartered Accountants of India (ICAI) ne Paper 5 (Auditing and Ethics) exam ki date revise ki hai.

Originally, this exam was scheduled for January 15, 2026, and then earlier rescheduled to January 19, 2026, due to municipal elections. However, due to certain unavoidable administrative reasons, the ICAI has further postponed the exam.

Here are the key details:
*   **Old Exam Date:** January 19, 2026 (originally January 15, 2026)
*   **New Exam Date:** January 31, 2026 (Saturday)
*   **Announcement Date:** January 19, 2026
*   **Timing & Centre:** The examination will be held at the same timings (2:00 PM to 5:00 PM IST) and at the same examination centres as previously announced.
*   **Admit Cards:** The admit cards already issued for the previous dates will remain valid for the rescheduled examination on January 31, 2026. You do not need to download a new one.
*   **Other Exams:** Please note that the schedule for all other CA Intermediate and Foundation examinations remains unchanged.

Students are advised to take note of this change and adjust their study plans accordingly.

## Read the Official Document
*   [Download the Official Notification/Circular here](https://www.icai.org/post.html?post_id=14606)

*Published on: 21 January 2026*
